Title: .NET Contributors
Description: .NET is an open-source project and is very thankful for the many community contributions it receives.

Title: Basic Windows Machine Hardware information from WMI for Exception Logging from .NET
Description: When writing out error information for a desktop application to a log whether local or to a telmetry engine, it's useful to get some idea of what hardware the app is running on. WPF applications in particular can have odd behaviors that are related to hardware acceleration, running inside of a VM or particular video drivers. In this short post I show how you can get very basic machine and GPU information that provides information on these basic system stats that can prove useful to trackdown rare hardware related issues.

Title: Twitter to end free access to its API in Elon Musk's latest monetization push
Description: Twitter will discontinue offering free access to the Twitter API starting February 9 and will launch a paid version.
